description: Try our easy to follow Potatoes Boulangère recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato bake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Potatoes Boulangère Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 900g all-purpose potatoes, peeled and cut into 5mm slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Melt the butter in a large pan, add the onions, and cook, stirring often, for 10 minutes, or until soft and translucent. Add the potatoes, garlic, and stock, and season with salt and black pepper. Stir well, then cover and simmer for 5-6 minutes, or until the potatoes start to soften but still have a bit of bite to them.
Transfer the mixture to a shallow 2.3L ovenproof dish and cook for 40-50 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and most of the stock has been absorbed. Serve with roast beef.
